rooms.description: Grand entrance hall with Vastu compliant east facing main door for positive energy flow, adorned with modern aesthetics.
Spacious living room designed in a modern farmhouse style, ample natural light through large windows; includes entertainment zone.
Modern dining area adjacent to the living room for joint family gatherings.
Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances and an open design, optimized layout for efficiency.
Dedicated servant quarters with basic amenities; Vastu compliant placement to ensure harmony.
Modern library space designed for quiet reading and study, featuring wall-mounted shelves and ample seating.
Private gym area equipped with modern fitness equipment, designed for personal use with soundproofing.
